                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    4165449x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the shape-normalized data

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    100503x
                    
                      
		t <- 1 - k * ((data - u) / s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support and then compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    100503x
                    
                      
		if (any(t <= 0)) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    99071x
                    
                      
		ll <- -log(s * sqrt(2 * pi)) - log(t) - (log(t)^2 / (2 * k^2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    4165449x
                    
                      
	} else if (model == "PE3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
		# Reparameterize

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    259939x
                    
                      
		a <- 4 / (k^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    259939x
                    
                      
		b <- s * abs(k) / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    259939x
                    
                      
		x <- u - (2 * s) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support 

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    259939x
                    
                      
		if ((k > 0 & any(data <= x)) | (k < 0 & any(data >= x))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    249181x
                    
                      
		t <- abs(data - x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    249181x
                    
                      
		ll <- (a - 1) * log(t) - (t / b) - a * log(b) - lgamma(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    4165449x
                    
                      
	} else if (model == "LP3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
		# Reparameterize

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    105413x
                    
                      
		a <- 4 / (k^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    105413x
                    
                      
		b <- s * abs(k) / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    105413x
                    
                      
		x <- u - (2 * s) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    105413x
                    
                      
		if ((k > 0 & any(log(data) <= x)) | (k < 0 & any(log(data) >= x))) return (-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    104543x
                    
                      
		t <- abs(log(data) - x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    104543x
                    
                      
		ll <- (a - 1) * log(t) - (t / b) - a * log(b) - lgamma(a) - log(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    4165449x
                    
                      
	} else if (model == "WEI") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
		# Check for support

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    127926x
                    
                      
		if (k <= 0 | any(data <= u)) return (-Inf) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    127827x
                    
                      
		t <- data - u

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    127827x
                    
                      
		ll <- log(k) - k * log(s) + (k - 1) * log(t) - (t / s)^k

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
	# The sum of the log-likelihood over all data points is the total log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    4139783x
                    
                      
	sum(ll)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Sen’s Trend Estimator

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Produces a scatter plot of the annual maximum streamflow (AMS) data or its variance

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' against time, overlaid with Sen’s trend estimator and an annotation of the fitted 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' equation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param results A list of Sen's trend estimates generated by \link{eda_sens_trend}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param type A character scalar representing whether Sen's trend estimator was  

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' applied directly to the AMS data (`"mean"`) or to the moving-window variance 

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' of the data (`"variance"`). Must be either `"variance"` or `"mean"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param show_trend If `TRUE` (default), draw a fitted line through the AMS data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Optional named arguments: 'title', 'xlabel', and 'ylabel'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `ggplot`; a plot containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - Black points for each year’s AMS (or variance) value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' - Optional black line connecting the AMS data if `show_trend = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' - Blue line representing Sen’s trend estimator.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' - A text annotation displaying the fitted equation \eqn{y = mx + b}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{eda_sens_trend}

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- eda_sens_trend(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' plot_sens_trend(results, "mean")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @import ggplot2

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom grid textGrob

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
plot_sens_trend <- function(results, type, show_trend = TRUE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    4x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(results$data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    4x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(results$years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
	# Load the results of the test into the environment

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    4x
                    
                      
	m <- results$slope

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    4x
                    
                      
	b <- results$intercept

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    4x
                    
                      
	equation <- sprintf("y = %.3fx + %.2f", m, b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
	# Capture optional arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    4x
                    
                      
	args <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
	# Set labels and data based on the type

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4x
                    
                      
	xlabel <- "Covariate"

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    4x
                    
                      
	if (type == "variance") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
		ylabel <- expression(AMS ~ Variance ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
		title <- "Sen's Trend Estimator (AMS Variance)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    4x
                    
                      
	} else if (type == "mean") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2x
                    
                      
		ylabel <- expression(AMS ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    2x
                    
                      
		title <- "Sen's Trend Estimator (AMS Mean)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
		stop("'type' must be either 'mean' or 'variance'")	

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    # Override defaults if provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$title))  title  <- args$title

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$xlabel)) xlabel <- args$xlabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$ylabel)) ylabel <- args$ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
	# Generate dataframes for the trend estimate, data

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    3x
                    
                      
	covariate <- get_covariates(years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    3x
                    
                      
	df_line <- data.frame(x = covariate, y = m * covariate + b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    3x
                    
                      
	df_data <- data.frame(x = covariate, y = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
	# First subplot: Plot of Sen's trend estimator

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    3x
                    
                      
	p1 <- ggplot(df_data, aes(x = .data$x, y = .data$y)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    3x
                    
                      
		geom_point(aes(color = "black"), size = 2.25) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    3x
                    
                      
		(if (show_trend) geom_line(color = "black", linewidth = 1.1) else NULL) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    3x
                    
                      
		geom_line(

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    3x
                    
                      
			data = df_line,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    3x
                    
                      
			aes(x = .data$x, y = .data$y, color = "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    3x
                    
                      
			linewidth = 1.2

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
		) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    3x
                    
                      
		labs(title = title, x = xlabel, y = ylabel, color = "Legend") + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    3x
                    
                      
		scale_color_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    3x
                    
                      
			values = c("blue" = "blue", "black" = "black"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    3x
                    
                      
			breaks = c("blue", "black"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    3x
                    
                      
			labels = c("Estimated Trend", ylabel),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
		) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
	# Add equation annotation, scales, and theme

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    3x
                    
                      
	p1 <- add_annotation(p1, equation)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    3x
                    
                      
	add_theme(add_scales(p1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
 

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Maximum Likelihood Parameter Estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Estimates parameters of a probability distribution with an optional trend  by 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' maximizing the log‐likelihood. Initial values are obtained through L‐moment 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' parameter estimation, and optimization is performed via \link[stats]{nlminb} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' with repeated perturbations if needed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-years

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-model

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list containing the results of parameter estimation:

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' - `params`: Numeric vector of estimated parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - `mll`: Maximum log‐likelihood value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' 1. Calls \link{fit_lmom_fast} on `data` to obtain initial parameter estimates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' 2. Initializes trend parameters to zero if necessary.  

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' 3. For `WEI` models, sets the location parameter to zero to ensure support.  

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' 4. Defines an objective function using the likelihood functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'    \link{loglik_fast} or \link{general_loglik_fast}.  

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' 5. Runs \link[stats]{nlminb} with box constraints. Attempts optimization

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'    up to 100 times if a maximum cannot be found.  

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @note Although the more modern \link[stats]{optim} function is preferred over 

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' \link[stats]{nlminb}, we use \link[stats]{nlminb} because it supports non-finite

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' values of the likelihood function. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{loglik_fast}, \link{general_loglik_fast}, \link{fit_lmom_fast},

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   \link[stats]{nlminb}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' trend <- list(location = TRUE, scale = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' fit_maximum_likelihood(data, "GNO", NULL, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats rnorm nlminb

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
fit_maximum_likelihood <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
	model,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
	prior = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
	years = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
	trend = NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    18090x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    18090x
                    
                      
	model <- validate_model(model)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    18090x
                    
                      
	prior <- validate_prior(prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    18090x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    18090x
                    
                      
	trend <- validate_trend(trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
	# Assume stationarity. Determine the initial parameters using L-moments.

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    18090x
                    
                      
	p <- fit_lmom_fast(data, model)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
	# Set the bounds and initial values for the location parameter(s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    18090x
                    
                      
	if (trend$location) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    10050x
                    
                      
		initial <- c(p[1], 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    10050x
                    
                      
		lower <- c(-Inf, -Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    10050x
                    
                      
		upper <- c( Inf,  Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    8040x
                    
                      
		initial <- c(p[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    8040x
                    
                      
		lower <- c(-Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    8040x
                    
                      
		upper <- c( Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
	# Set the bounds and initial values for the scale parameter(s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    18090x
                    
                      
	if (trend$scale) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    21x
                    
                      
		initial <- c(initial, p[2], 0)	

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    21x
                    
                      
		lower <- c(lower, 1e-8, -Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    21x
                    
                      
		upper <- c(upper,  Inf, Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    18069x
                    
                      
		initial <- c(initial, p[2])

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    18069x
                    
                      
		lower <- c(lower, 1e-8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    18069x
                    
                      
		upper <- c(upper,  Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
	} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
	# Set the bounds and initial values for the shape parameter (if necessary)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    18090x
                    
                      
	info <- model_info(model)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    18090x
                    
                      
	if (info$n_params == 3) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    15071x
                    
                      
		initial <- c(initial, p[3])

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
		# Shape parameter must between -0.5 and 0.5 if we are doing GMLE 

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    15071x
                    
                      
		if (!is.null(prior)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    4022x
                    
                      
			lower <- c(lower, -0.5 + 1e-8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    4022x
                    
                      
			upper <- c(upper,  0.5 - 1e-8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    11049x
                    
                      
			lower <- c(lower, -Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    11049x
                    
                      
			upper <- c(upper,  Inf)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
		} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
	# Initialize location parameter to 0 for Weibull model to ensure support

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    18090x
                    
                      
	if (model == "WEI") initial[1] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
	# Maximize the log-likelihood by minimizing the negative log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    18090x
                    
                      
	objective <- function(theta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    3359354x
                    
                      
		if (!is.null(prior)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    1232803x
                    
                      
			0 - general_loglik_fast(data, model, theta, prior, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    2126551x
                    
                      
			0 - loglik_fast(data, model, theta, years, trend) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
	} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function for running parameter optimization

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    18090x
                    
                      
	optimizer <- function(params) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    18222x
                    
                      
		nlminb(params, objective, lower = lower, upper = upper)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
	# Repeatedly attempt optimization using the nlminb() function

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    18090x
                    
                      
	attempts <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    18090x
                    
                      
	params <- initial

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    18090x
                    
                      
	while (attempts <= 100) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
		# Attempt to run the optimize() function

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    18222x
                    
                      
		result <- optimizer(params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
		# If optimization succeeded, end the loop

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    18222x
                    
                      
		if (result$objective != Inf) break

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
		# If optimization failed, perturb the parameters and try again

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    132x
                    
                      
		perturbation <- rnorm(n = length(initial), mean = 0, sd = 0.2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    132x
                    
                      
		params <- initial * (1 + perturbation)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    132x
                    
                      
		attempts <- attempts + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
	# Return the optimal parameters and maximum log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    18090x
                    
                      
	list(params = result$par, mll = -result$objective)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Log-Likelihood Functions for Probability Models

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Compute the log-likelihood value for stationary and non-stationary variants 

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' of nine different distributions: `"GUM"`, `"NOR"`, `"LNO"`, `"GEV"`, `"GLO"`, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' `"GNO"`, `"PE3"`, `"LP3"`, or `"WEI"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' 

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-params

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-years

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Numeric scalar. The log-likelihood value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{loglik_fast}

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize data, params, years, and trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' params <- c(0, 1, 1, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' trend <- list(location = TRUE, scale = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' # Compute the log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' loglik_gno(data, params, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @name loglik_methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname loglik_methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
loglik_gum <- function(data, params, years = NULL, trend = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    3x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    3x
                    
                      
	params <- validate_params(params, "GUM", trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    3x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    3x
                    
                      
	trend <- validate_trend(trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    3x
                    
                      
	loglik_fast(data, "GUM", params, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname loglik_methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
loglik_nor <- function(data, params, years = NULL, trend = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    3x

                    45
                    3x
                    
                      
	params <- validate_params(params, "NOR", trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    3x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    3x
                    
                      
	trend <- validate_trend(trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    3x
                    
                      
	loglik_fast(data, "NOR", params, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname loglik_methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
loglik_lno <- function(data, params, years = NULL, trend = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x

                    56
                    3x

                    57
                    3x

                    58
                    3x

                    59
                    3x

                    3x

loglik_wei <- function(data, params, years = NULL, trend = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    3x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    3x
                    
                      
	params <- validate_params(params, "WEI", trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    3x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    3x
                    
                      
	trend <- validate_trend(trend)
