                    3x
                    
                      
	loglik_fast(data, "WEI", params, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Helper Function for L-moments Parameter Estimation

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function used by \link{fit_lmom_methods}. 

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' This function does not validate parameters and is intended for internal use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-model

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric vector of parameters:

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' - If `model` is `"GUM"`, `"NOR"`, or `"LNO"`, returns a vector of length 2.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' - Otherwise, returns a vector of length 3.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' Hosking, J.R.M. & Wallis, J.R., 1997. Regional frequency analysis: an approach based 

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' on L-Moments. Cambridge University Press, New York, USA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{lmom_sample}, \link{fit_lmom_kappa}, \link{fit_lmom_methods}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' fit_lmom_fast(data, "PE3")

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
fit_lmom_fast <- function(data, model) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
	# Get the correct L-moments based on the distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    198153x
                    
                      
	moments <- if (model == "LP3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    11012x
                    
                      
		lmom_sample(log(data))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    187141x
                    
                      
		lmom_sample(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
	# Unpack the L-moments

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    198153x
                    
                      
	l1 <- moments[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    198153x
                    
                      
	l2 <- moments[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    198153x
                    
                      
	t3 <- moments[3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    198153x
                    
                      
	t4 <- moments[4]

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: -digamma(1) is Euler's constant (~0.5772)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    198153x
                    
                      
	if (model == "GUM") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    21016x
                    
                      
		s <- l2 / log(2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    21016x
                    
                      
		u <- l1	+ digamma(1) * s

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    21016x
                    
                      
		k <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "NOR") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    21012x
                    
                      
		u <- l1

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    21012x
                    
                      
		s <- l2 * sqrt(pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    21012x
                    
                      
		k <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: Copied from MATLAB, not sure why we use this formula.

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "LNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    21012x
                    
                      
		s <- sqrt(2) * qnorm((1 + (l2 / l1)) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    21012x
                    
                      
        u <- log(l1) - s^2 / 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    21012x
                    
                      
		k <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GEV") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    53049x
                    
                      
		c <- (2 / (3 + t3)) - (log(2) / log(3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    53049x
                    
                      
		k <- -7.8590 * c - 2.9554 * c^2

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    53049x
                    
                      
		s <- (l2 * -k) / ((1 - 2^k) * gamma(1 - k))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    53049x
                    
                      
		u <- l1 + s * (1 - gamma(1 - k)) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GLO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    20011x
                    
                      
		k <- -t3

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    20011x
                    
                      
		s <- l2 * sin(k * pi) / (k * pi)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    20011x
                    
                      
		u <- l1 - s * ((1 / k) - (pi / sin(k * pi)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "GNO") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
		# Define coefficients

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    21013x
                    
                      
     	A0 <-  0.20466534e1

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    21013x
                    
                      
 		A1 <- -0.36544371e1

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    21013x
                    
                      
	 	A2 <-  0.18396733e1

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    21013x
                    
                      
		A3 <- -0.20360244

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    21013x
                    
                      
      	B1 <- -0.20182173e1

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    21013x
                    
                      
		B2 <-  0.12420401e1

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    21013x
                    
                      
		B3 <- -0.21741801

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute shape parameter

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    21013x
                    
                      
		tt <- t3^2

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    21013x
                    
                      
		k1 <-  -t3 * (A0 + tt * (A1 + tt *(A2 + tt * A3)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    21013x
                    
                      
		k2 <- 1 + tt * (B1 + tt * (B2 + tt * B3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    21013x
                    
                      
        k <- k1 / k2 

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
		# Define the error function erf(z)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    21013x
                    
                      
		erf <- function(z) 2 * pnorm(z * sqrt(2)) - 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute location and scale parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    21013x
                    
                      
        x = exp(k^2 / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    21013x
                    
                      
        s = l2 * k / (x * erf(k / 2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    21013x
                    
                      
        u = l1 + s * (x - 1) / k

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
	# NOTE: Computation for PE3 and LP3 is identical, just with different sample L-moments

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "PE3" | model == "LP3") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
		# Define constants for numerical approximation

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    21026x
                    
                      
		A1 <- 0.2906

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    21026x
                    
                      
		B1 <- 0.1882

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    21026x
                    
                      
		B2 <- 0.0442

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    21026x
                    
                      
		C1 <- 0.36067

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    21026x
                    
                      
		C2 <- 0.59567

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    21026x
                    
                      
		C3 <- 0.25361

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    21026x
                    
                      
		D1 <- 2.78861

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    21026x
                    
                      
		D2 <- 2.56096

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    21026x
                    
                      
		D3 <- 0.77045

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute z and a

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    21026x
                    
                      
		a <- if (0 < abs(t3) & abs(t3) < (1 / 3)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    20716x
                    
                      
			z <- 3 * pi * t3^2

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    20716x
                    
                      
			(1 + A1 * z) / (z + B1 * z^2 + B2 * z^3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    310x
                    
                      
			z <- 1 - t3

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    310x
                    
                      
			(C1 * z - C2 * z^2 + C3 * z^3) / (1 - D1 * z + D2 * z^2 - D3 * z^3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute parameter estimates

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    21026x
                    
                      
		u <- l1

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    21026x
                    
                      
		s <- l2 * pi^0.5 * a^0.5 * exp(lgamma(a) - lgamma(a + 0.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    21026x
                    
                      
		k <- 2 * a^-0.5 * sign(t3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    198153x
                    
                      
	else if (model == "WEI") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
		# Estimate GEV parameters, flipping the sign of l1, t3

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    20014x
                    
                      
		c <- (2 / (3 - t3)) - (log(2) / log(3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    20014x
                    
                      
		kg <- 7.8590 * c + 2.9554 * c^2

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    20014x
                    
                      
		sg <- (l2 * kg) / ((1 - 2^-kg) * gamma(1 + kg))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    20014x
                    
                      
		ug <- -l1 - sg * (1 - gamma(1 + kg)) / kg

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    20014x
                    
                      
		k <- 1 / kg

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    20014x
                    
                      
		s <- sg / kg

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    20014x
                    
                      
		u <- -ug - s

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
	} 

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
	# Return results as a vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    198153x
                    
                      
	c(u, s, k)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Pettitt Test for Abrupt Changes in the Mean of a Time Series

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Performs the non-parametric Pettitt test to detect a single change point in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' mean of a time series, used to identify abrupt shifts in hydrological data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-years

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-quiet

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list containing the test results, including:

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' - `data`: The `data` argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - `years`: The `years` argument.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - `u_t`: Numeric vector of absolute U-statistics for all time indices.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' - `k_statistic`: Numeric scalar.Tthe maximum absolute U-statistic.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' - `k_critical`: Numeric scalar. The critical K-statistic value for given `alpha`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - `p_value`: Numeric scalar. Approximate p-value for the test.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - `change_index`: Integer scalar. Index of the detected change point (0 if none).

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - `change_year`: Integer scalar. Year of the detected change point (0 if none).

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' - `reject`: Logical scalar. If `TRUE`, the null hypothesis was rejected.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' - `msg`: Character scalar. A formatted summary message describing the test result.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' The Pettitt test is a rank-based non-parametric test that evaluates the

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' hypothesis of a change point in the mean of a time series. It computes the 

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' maximum of the absolute value of the U-statistic over all possible split 

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' points. The p-value is approximated using an asymptotic formula.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{plot_pettitt_test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' eda_pettitt_test(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
 

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
eda_pettitt_test <- function(data, years, alpha = 0.05, quiet = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    7x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    7x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    7x
                    
                      
 	alpha <- validate_alpha(alpha)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    7x
                    
                      
	quiet <- validate_quiet(quiet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    7x
                    
                      
	n <- length(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    7x
                    
                      
	u_t <- numeric(n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
	# u_t = sum(sign(data[j] - data[i])) for all i <= t, j > t

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    7x
                    
                      
	for (t in 1:n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    670x
                    
                      
		u <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    670x
                    
                      
		for (i in 1:t) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    32564x
                    
                      
			for (j in min(t + 1, n):n) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1039657x
                    
                      
				u = u + sign(data[j] - data[i])

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
			}

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    670x
                    
                      
		u_t[t] = abs(u)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
	# Use an approximation since there is no closed-form solution for the p-value

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    7x
                    
                      
	k_statistic <- max(u_t)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    7x
                    
                      
	k_critical <- (-log(alpha) * ((n^3) + (n^2)) / 6)^0.5;

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    7x
                    
                      
	p_value <- round(exp((-6 * k_statistic^2) / (n^3 + n^2)), 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
	# The Pettitt test identifies either 0 or 1 change points

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    7x
                    
                      
	reject <- (p_value <= alpha)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    7x
                    
                      
	change_index <- ifelse(reject, which.max(u_t), 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    7x
                    
                      
	change_year <- ifelse(reject, years[change_index], 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    7x
                    
                      
	msg <- stats_message(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    7x
                    
                      
		"Pettitt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    7x
                    
                      
		reject,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    7x
                    
                      
		p_value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    7x
                    
                      
		alpha,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    7x
                    
                      
		"NO evidence of a change point",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    7x
                    
                      
		sprintf("evidence of a change point in %f", change_year)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    7x
                    
                      
	if (!quiet) message(msg)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    7x
                    
                      
	list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    7x
                    
                      
		data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    7x
                    
                      
		years = years,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    7x
                    
                      
		u_t = u_t,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    7x
                    
                      
		k_statistic = k_statistic,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    7x
                    
                      
		k_critical = k_critical,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    7x
                    
                      
		p_value = p_value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    7x
                    
                      
		change_index = change_index,

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    7x
                    
                      
		change_year = change_year,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    7x
                    
                      
		reject = reject,

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    7x
                    
                      
		msg = msg

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Theoretical L-moments of Probability Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Computes the first four L-moments and L-moment ratios of seven different 

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' probability distributions (`GUM`, `NOR`, `GEV`, `GLO`, `GNO`, `PE3`, and `WEI`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' given the parameters of the distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-params

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' The distributions `GUM`, `NOR`, `GEV`, `GLO`, and `WEI` have closed-form solutions

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' for the L-moments and L-moment ratios in terms of the parameters. The distributions 

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `GNO`, `PE3` use rational approximations of the L-moment ratios from Hosking (1997).

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric vector of length 4 containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\lambda_1}: L-mean

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\lambda_2}: L-variance

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\tau_3}: L-skewness

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - \eqn{\tau_4}: L-kurtosis

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{lmom_fast}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @references

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' Hosking, J.R.M. & Wallis, J.R., 1997. Regional frequency analysis: an approach based 

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' on L-Moments. Cambridge University Press, New York, USA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' lmom_theoretical_gev(c(0, 1, 0))

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @name lmom_theoretical

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname lmom_theoretical

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
lmom_theoretical_gum <- function(params) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    2x
                    
                      
	params <- validate_params(params, "GUM", NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    2x
                    
                      
	lmom_fast("GUM", params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname lmom_theoretical

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
lmom_theoretical_nor <- function(params) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    2x
                    
                      
	params <- validate_params(params, "NOR", NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
	lmom_fast("NOR", params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname lmom_theoretical

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    48

#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    55

                    62

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# Parameter validation helper functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
validate_data <- function(data, positive = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    18441x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(data)) stop("'data' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    18437x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(data)) stop("'data' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    18434x
                    
                      
	if (length(data) == 0) stop("'data' must be non-empty")

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    18433x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(data) | is.na(data))) stop("'data' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    18431x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.infinite(data))) stop("'data' must be finite")

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    18429x
                    
                      
	if (positive & any(data < 0)) stop("'data' must be non-negative")

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    18426x
                    
                      
	return (data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
validate_model <- function(model) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    18165x
                    
                      
	options <- c("GUM", "NOR", "LNO", "GEV", "GLO", "GNO", "PE3", "LP3", "WEI")

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    18165x
                    
                      
	text <- paste(options, collapse = ", ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    18165x
                    
                      
	if (!is.character(model)) stop("'model' must be a character string")

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    18161x
                    
                      
	if (length(model) != 1L) stop("'model' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    18160x
                    
                      
	if (!(model %in% options)) stop(sprintf("'model' must be one of %s", text))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    18157x
                    
                      
	return (as.vector(model))

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
validate_method <- function(method) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    43x
                    
                      
	options <- c("L-moments", "MLE", "GMLE")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    43x
                    
                      
	text <- paste(options, collapse = ", ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    43x
                    
                      
	if (!is.character(method)) stop("'method' must be a character string")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    39x
                    
                      
	if (length(method) != 1) stop("'method' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    38x
                    
                      
	if (!(method %in% options)) stop(sprintf("'method' must be one of %s", text))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    35x
                    
                      
	return (method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
validate_params <- function(params, model, trend = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    360621x
                    
                      
	n <- model_info(model, trend)$n_params 

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    360621x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(params)) stop("'params' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    360617x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(params)) stop("'params' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    360614x
                    
                      
	if (length(params) != n) stop(sprintf("'params' must have length %d", n))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    360611x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(params) | is.na(params))) stop("'params' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    360609x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.infinite(params))) stop("'params' must be finite")

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    360607x
                    
                      
	return (params)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
validate_prior <- function(prior) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
	# If prior is NULL, return immediately

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    18180x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(prior)) return (NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
	# If prior is not NULL, ensure it is a positive numeric vector of length 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    4062x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(prior)) stop("'prior' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    4059x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(prior)) stop("'prior' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    4056x
                    
                      
	if (length(prior) != 2) stop("'prior' must have length 2")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    4054x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(prior) | is.na(prior))) stop("'prior' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    4052x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.infinite(prior))) stop("'prior' must be finite")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    4050x
                    
                      
	if (any(prior <= 0)) stop("'prior' must be strictly positive")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    4047x
                    
                      
	return (prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
validate_years <- function(years, data = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
	# If years is NULL, return 

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    18313x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(years)) return (NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
	# If years is not NULL, check that it is a numeric vector with no missing values

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    10264x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(years)) stop("'years' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    10261x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(years)) stop("'years' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    10258x
                    
                      
	if (length(years) == 0) stop("'years' must be non-empty")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    10257x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(years) | is.na(years))) stop("'years' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    10255x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.infinite(years))) stop("'years' must be finite")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
	# If data is NULL, return

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    10253x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(data)) return (years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
	# If data is not NULL, check that it has same length as years

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    10233x
                    
                      
	if (length(years) != length(data)) stop("'years' and 'data' must have equal length")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    10231x
                    
                      
	return (years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
validate_trend <- function(trend) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
	# If trend is NULL, return a stationary trend object

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    378752x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(trend)) return (list(location = FALSE, scale = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
	# Validate the location option

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    18185x
                    
                      
	location <- trend$location

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    18185x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(location)) stop("'trend' requires item 'location'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    18184x
                    
                      
	if (!is.logical(location)) stop("'trend$location' must be logical")

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    18184x
                    
                      
	if (length(location) != 1) stop("'trend$location' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
	# Validate the scale option

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    18183x
                    
                      
	scale <- trend$scale

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    18183x
                    
                      
	if (is.null(scale)) stop("'trend' requires item 'scale'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    18182x
                    
                      
	if (!is.logical(scale)) stop("'trend$scale' must be logical")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    18181x
                    
                      
	if (length(scale) != 1) stop("'trend$scale' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    18181x
                    
                      
	return (trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
validate_slice <- function(slice) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    360603x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(slice)) stop("'slice' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    360600x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(slice)) stop("'slice' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    360597x
                    
                      
	if (length(slice) != 1) stop("'slice' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    360595x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(slice) | is.na(slice))) stop("'slice' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    360593x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.infinite(slice))) stop("'slice' must be finite")

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    360591x
                    
                      
	return (slice)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
validate_samples <- function(samples) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    54x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(samples)) stop("'samples' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    51x
                    
                      
	if (!is.integer(samples)) stop("'samples' must be an integer")

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    48x
                    
                      
	if (length(samples) != 1) stop("'samples' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    46x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(samples) | is.na(samples))) stop("'samples' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    44x
                    
                      
	return (samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
validate_quiet <- function(quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    106x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(quiet)) stop("'quiet' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    103x
                    
                      
	if (!is.logical(quiet)) stop("'quiet' must be logical")

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    100x
                    
                      
	if (length(quiet) != 1) stop("'quiet' must have length 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    98x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(quiet) | is.na(quiet))) stop("'quiet' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    96x
                    
                      
	return (quiet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
validate_probabilities <- function(p) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    360546x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(p)) stop("'p' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    360542x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(p)) stop("'p' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    360539x
                    
                      
	if (length(p) == 0) stop("'p' must be non-empty")

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    360538x
                    
                      
	if (any(is.nan(p) | is.na(p))) stop("'p' must have no missing values")

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    360536x
                    
                      
	if (any(p < 0 | p > 1)) stop("'p' must be between 0 and 1 inclusive")

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    360534x
                    
                      
	return (p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
validate_alpha <- function(alpha) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    142x
                    
                      
	if (!is.vector(alpha)) stop("'alpha' must be a vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    138x
                    
                      
	if (!is.numeric(alpha)) stop("'alpha' must be numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
