#' The Z-statistic is determined by fitting a four-parameter Kappa distribution to the 

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' raw and log-transformed data. Then, bootstrapped samples from this Kappa distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' The L-moments of these bootstrapped samples are used to estimate the Z-statistic 

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' for each distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{select_ldistance}, \link{select_lkurtosis}, \link{fit_lmom_kappa},

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   \link{quantile_fast}, \link{plot_lmom_diagram}

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' select_zstatistic(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats runif optim

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
select_zstatistic <- function(data, samples = 10000L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    6x
                    
                      
	validate_data(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    6x
                    
                      
	validate_samples(samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
	# Helper function that attempts to fit a Kappa distribution and draw a bootstrap

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    6x
                    
                      
	get_bootstrap <- function(data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the sample L-moments for the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    12x
                    
                      
		moments <- lmom_sample(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    12x
                    
                      
		sample_l1 <- moments[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    12x
                    
                      
		sample_l2 <- moments[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    12x
                    
                      
		sample_t3 <- moments[3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    12x
                    
                      
		sample_t4 <- moments[4]

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
		# Check that the smaple L-moments are viable

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    12x
                    
                      
		if (sample_t4 > (1 + 5 * sample_t3^2) / 6) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
			return (NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
		# Attempt to fit the Kappa distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    10x
                    
                      
		params <- fit_lmom_kappa(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
		# Generate a bootstrap from this Kappa distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    10x
                    
                      
		t4_list <- lapply(1:samples, function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    235000x
                    
                      
			u <- runif(length(data))	

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    235000x
                    
                      
			lmom_sample(quantile_kap(u, params))[4]

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
		})

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    10x
                    
                      
		t4 <- as.numeric(t4_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
		# Compute bias and standard deviation of t4 estimates

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    10x
                    
                      
		bias_t4 <- mean(t4 - sample_t4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    10x
                    
                      
		std_t4 <- sqrt(mean((t4 - sample_t4)^2) - bias_t4^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
		# Return the results as a list

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    10x
                    
                      
		list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    10x
                    
                      
			params = params,

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    10x
                    
                      
			sample_t3 = sample_t3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    10x
                    
                      
			sample_t4 = sample_t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    10x
                    
                      
			t4 = t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    10x
                    
                      
			bias_t4 = bias_t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    10x
                    
                      
			std_t4 = std_t4

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
		)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
	# Attempt to fit kappa distribution to the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    6x
                    
                      
	reg_bootstrap <- get_bootstrap(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
	# Attempt to fit kappa distribution to log(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    6x
                    
                      
	log_bootstrap <- get_bootstrap(log(data))

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
	# Initialize list of metrics

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    6x
                    
                      
	metrics <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
	# Iterate through the list of three parameter distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    6x
                    
                      
	for (model in c("GEV", "GLO", "GNO", "PE3", "LP3", "WEI")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
		# Get distribution information

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    36x
                    
                      
		info <- model_info(model)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the correct bootstrap

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    36x
                    
                      
		if (info$log & !is.null(log_bootstrap)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    4x
                    
                      
			b <- log_bootstrap		

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    36x
                    
                      
		} else if (!info$log & !is.null(reg_bootstrap)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    30x
                    
                      
			b <- reg_bootstrap

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
		} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    2x
                    
                      
			next

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
		# Find the shape parameter with the same L-skewness as the data

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    34x
                    
                      
		objective <- function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1033x
                    
                      
			distribution_t3 <- lmom_fast(model, c(0, 1, i))[3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    1033x
                    
                      
			abs(distribution_t3 - b$sample_t3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
		}

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
		# Run optimization for three parameter distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    34x
                    
                      
		result <- optim(

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    34x
                    
                      
			par = (info$k_bounds[1] + info$k_bounds[2]) / 2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    34x
                    
                      
			fn = objective,

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    34x
                    
                      
			method = "Brent",

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    34x
                    
                      
			lower = info$k_bounds[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    34x
                    
                      
			upper = info$k_bounds[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
		)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
		# Get the parameters of the fitted distribution and compute the z-score

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    34x
                    
                      
		distribution_t4 <- lmom_fast(model, c(0, 1, result$par))[4]

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    34x
                    
                      
		z <- (distribution_t4 - b$sample_t4 + b$bias_t4) / b$std_t4

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    34x
                    
                      
		metrics[[model]] <- z

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
	# Determine the recommendation (distribution with lowest L-distance)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    6x
                    
                      
	index <- which.min(abs(unlist(metrics)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    6x
                    
                      
	recommendation <- names(metrics)[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
	# Return the results as a list

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    6x
                    
                      
	list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    6x
                    
                      
		method = "Z-statistic",

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    6x
                    
                      
		data = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    6x
                    
                      
		metrics = metrics,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    6x
                    
                      
		recommendation = recommendation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    6x
                    
                      
		reg_params = reg_bootstrap$params,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    6x
                    
                      
		reg_bias_t4 = reg_bootstrap$bias_t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    6x
                    
                      
		reg_std_t4 = reg_bootstrap$std_t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    6x
                    
                      
		log_params = log_bootstrap$params,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    6x
                    
                      
		log_bias_t4 = log_bootstrap$bias_t4,

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    6x
                    
                      
		log_std_t4 = log_bootstrap$std_t4

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Estimate Variance for Annual Maximum Streamflow Data 

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This function estimates the standard deviation of a vector of annual maximum 

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' streamflow (AMS) data using a moving window algorithm, returning a list that

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' pairs each window’s mean year with its computed standard deviation. The 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' parameters `size` and `step` parameters control the behaviour of the window.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-years

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param size Integer scalar. The number of years in each moving window.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   Must be a positive number less than or equal to `length(data)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   (default is 10). If `length(data) < size`, an error is raised.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param step Integer scalar. The offset (in years) between successive 

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   moving windows. Must be a positive number (default is 5).

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with two entries:

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - `years`: Numeric vector containing the mean year within each window.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' - `std`: Numeric vector of standard deviations within each window.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' ams_mw_variance(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats sd

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
ams_mw_variance <- function(data, years, size = 10, step = 5) { 

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    18x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(data, FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    18x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(years, data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
	# If length(data) < size, we cannot create a moving window.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    18x
                    
                      
	n <- length(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    18x
                    
                      
  	if (n < size) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    1x
                    
                      
		stop(sprintf("'data' does not have enough entries (%d < %d)", n, size))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    17x
                    
                      
	std_series <- c()

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    17x
                    
                      
	year_series <- c()

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    17x
                    
                      
	location <- min(years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	# Once the leading edge of the moving window is past max(years) we stop.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    17x
                    
                      
	while (location <= max(years) - size + 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    324x
                    
                      
		window <- which(years >= location & years < location + size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    324x
                    
                      
		std <- sd(data[window])

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    324x
                    
                      
		std_series <- c(std_series, std)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    324x
                    
                      
		year <- mean(years[window])

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    324x
                    
                      
		year_series <- c(year_series, year)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
		# Increment move the trailing edge of the moving window by the step

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    324x
                    
                      
		location <- location + step

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    17x
                    
                      
	list(std = std_series, year = year_series)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Results from the Pettitt Change‐Point Test

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Creates a two‐panel visualization of the Mann–Whitney–Pettitt test. The 

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' upper panel plots the Pettitt \eqn{U_t} statistic over time along with the 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' significance threshold and potential change point. The lower panel displays 

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' the annual maximum streamflow (AMS) data with an optional trend line, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' estimates of the mean, and potential change point.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param results A list generated by \link{eda_pettitt_test}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param show_trend If `TRUE` (default), draw a fitted line through the AMS data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Optional named arguments: 'title', 'top_xlabel', 'top_ylabel', 

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   'bottom_xlabel' and 'bottom_ylabel'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A \code{patchwork} object with two \code{ggplot2} panels stacked vertically.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- eda_pettitt_test(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' plot_pettitt_test(results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{eda_pettitt_test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @import ggplot2

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @import patchwork

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
plot_pettitt_test <- function(results, show_trend = TRUE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    2x
                    
                      
	data <- validate_data(results$data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(results$years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
	# Add u_t to df and create change point df (if change point is significant)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2x
                    
                      
	df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    2x
                    
                      
		max = data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    2x
                    
                      
		year = years,

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    2x
                    
                      
		u_t = results$u_t

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
	change_df <- df[results$change_index, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
	# Get the segment endpoints depending on whether there is a change point

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    2x
                    
                      
	n <- length(results$u_t)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    2x
                    
                      
	ends <- if (results$change_index == 0) c(1, n) else c(1, results$change_index, n) 

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    2x
                    
                      
	n_ends <- length(ends)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    2x
                    
                      
	get_segment_mean <- function(i) mean(df$max[ends[i]:ends[i + 1]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute the segment means for the plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2x
                    
                      
	segment_df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2x
                    
                      
		x = df$year[ends[-n_ends]],            

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2x
                    
                      
		xend = df$year[ends[-1]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    2x
                    
                      
		y = sapply(1:(n_ends - 1), get_segment_mean)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
	)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
	# Capture optional arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2x
                    
                      
	args <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
	# Define labels for the plot 

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
    title <- "Mann-Whitney-Pettitt Test"

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
	top_xlabel <- "Year" 

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
	top_ylabel <- expression(U[t] ~ Statistic)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
	bottom_xlabel <- "Year" 

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
	bottom_ylabel <- expression(AMS ~ m^3/s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    # Override defaults if provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$title))  title  <- args$title

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$top_xlabel)) top_xlabel <- args$top_xlabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$top_ylabel)) top_ylabel <- args$top_ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$bottom_xlabel)) bottom_xlabel <- args$bottom_xlabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$bottom_ylabel)) bottom_ylabel <- args$bottom_ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
	# First subplot: Mann-Whitney-Pettitt Test

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    2x
                    
                      
	p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$year, y = .data$u_t)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_line(aes(color = "black"), linewidth = 1.2) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_hline(

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    2x
                    
                      
			aes(yintercept = results$k_critical, color = "red"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    2x
                    
                      
			linewidth = 1.2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    2x
                    
                      
			linetype = "dashed",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
		) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_point(data = change_df, aes(color = "blue"), size = 4) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    2x
                    
                      
		labs(title = title, x = top_xlabel, y = top_ylabel, color = "Legend") + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    2x
                    
                      
		scale_color_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    2x
                    
                      
			values = c("black" = "black", "red" = "red", "blue" = "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    2x
                    
                      
			breaks = c("black", "red", "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
			labels = c(top_ylabel, "Change Point Threshold", "Potential Change Point")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
		)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
		

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
	# Also plot the original flow data and segment means

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    2x
                    
                      
	p2 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$year, y = max)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_point(aes(color = "black"), size = 2.25) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    2x
                    
                      
		(if (show_trend) geom_line(color = "black", linewidth = 1.1) else NULL) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_segment(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    2x
                    
                      
			data = segment_df, 

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    2x
                    
                      
			aes(x = .data$x, xend = .data$xend, y = .data$y, color = "green4"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    2x
                    
                      
			linewidth = 1.2 

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
		) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    2x
                    
                      
		geom_point(data = change_df, aes(color = "blue"), size = 4) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    2x
                    
                      
		labs(x = bottom_xlabel, y = bottom_ylabel, color = "Legend") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    2x
                    
                      
		scale_color_manual(

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    2x
                    
                      
			values = c("black" = "black", "green4" = "green4", "blue" = "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    2x
                    
                      
			breaks = c("black", "green4", "blue"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    2x
                    
                      
			labels = c(bottom_ylabel, "Segment Mean(s)", "Potential Change Point")

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
		)	

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
	# Stack plots on top of each other and return

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    2x
                    
                      
	add_theme(add_scales(p1)) / add_theme(add_scales(p2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Runs Test Results

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Generates a residual plot of Sen’s estimator applied to annual maximum streamflow

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' (AMS) data with a horizontal dashed line at zero and an annotation of the Runs 

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' test .

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param results A list of runs test results generated by \link{eda_runs_test}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param type A character scalar representing whether Sen's trend estimator was  

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' applied directly to the AMS data (`"mean"`) or to the moving-window variance 

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' of the data (`"variance"`). Must be either `"variance"` or `"mean"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Optional named arguments: 'title', 'xlabel', and 'ylabel'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `ggplot`; a plot containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' - Black points for the residual at each year.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' - A red dashed horizontal line at \eqn{y = 0}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' - A text annotation “Runs : X.XXX” in the plot area.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{eda_runs_test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize data and years

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' # Generate runs test plot 

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' sens <- eda_sens_trend(data, years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' results <- eda_runs_test(sens)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' plot_runs_test(results, "mean")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @import ggplot2

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom grid textGrob grobTree rectGrob gpar

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
plot_runs_test <- function(results, type, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    4x
                    
                      
	years <- validate_years(results$years)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
	# Set labels and data based on the name

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    4x
                    
                      
	if (type == "variance") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
		title <- "Sen's Estimator Residuals (AMS Variance)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    4x
                    
                      
	} else if (type == "mean") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    2x
                    
                      
		title <- "Sen's Estimator Residuals (AMS Mean)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
	} else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
		stop("'type' must be either 'mean' or 'variance'")	

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
	}

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	# Generate dataframes for the trend estimate, data, and residuals

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    3x
                    
                      
	df_residuals <- data.frame(x = years, y = results$residuals)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
	# Capture optional arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    3x
                    
                      
	args <- list(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    # Set default values

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    3x
                    
                      
    title <- "Residual Plot"

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    3x
                    
                      
    xlabel <- "Year"

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    3x
                    
                      
    ylabel <- "Residual Value"

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    # Override defaults if provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$title))  title  <- args$title

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$xlabel)) xlabel <- args$xlabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(args$ylabel)) ylabel <- args$ylabel

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
	# First subplot: Plot of residuals

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    3x
                    
                      
	p1 <- ggplot(df_residuals, aes(x = .data$x, y = .data$y)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    3x
                    
                      
		geom_point(color = "black", size = 2.25) + 

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    3x
                    
                      
	    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "red", linetype = "dashed", linewidth = 1.2) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    3x
                    
                      
		labs(title = title, x = xlabel, y = ylabel)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
	# Add  annotation

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    3x
                    
                      
	runs_label <- sprintf("Runs p-value: %.3f", results$p_value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    3x
                    
                      
	p1 <- add_annotation(p1, runs_label)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
	# Return the plot with added theme

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    3x
                    
                      
	add_theme(add_scales(p1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
 

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Generalized Log-Likelihood Helper Function

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A helper function used by \link{general_loglik_gev}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' This function does not validate parameters and is intended for internal use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-data

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-model

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-params

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-years

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams param-trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Numeric scalar. The generalized log-likelihood value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso \link{general_loglik_gev}.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' # Initialize data, params, prior, years, and trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' data <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 100, sd = 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' params <- c(0, 1, 1, 0, 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' prior <- c(5, 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' years <- seq(from = 1901, to = 2000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' trend <- list(location = TRUE, scale = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' # Compute the generalized log-likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' general_loglik_fast(data, "GEV", params, prior, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
general_loglik_fast <- function(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
	data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
	model,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
	params,

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
	prior,

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
	years,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
	trend

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
	# The prior is Beta(p, q)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	p <- prior[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	q <- prior[2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute the contribution of the prior to the likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	k <- params[length(params)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	pll <- (p - 1) * log(0.5 - k) + (q - 1) * log(0.5 + k) - lbeta(p, q)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
	# Compute the likelihood

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	llv <- loglik_fast(data, model, params, years, trend)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
	# Return the sum of (pll, llv) over all the data points

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1440991x
                    
                      
	n <- length(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1440991x
